Commentary: Junaid Khan to Gayle, OUT, and that's a way to start the innings...What a superb ball was that, first ball duck for the big man Gayle. This was a fullish one which swung back in touch around the off stump and Gayle was quite late to get his bat down to jab that down. Ball sneaks through and clatters the stumps and out comes the zing bails. That's a delight of every bowler when you have Gayle as a batsman. Fast, quick and a bit of swing..That's the story of Gayle for tonight..
Junaid Khan to Delport, no run, this one straightish around the off stump, punches to cover point by staying in crease..

Junaid Khan to Delport, OUT, he belts this to the left of mid-on, touch short around the off stump as Delport works it away off the back foot. Both the batsmen ran across for a quick single. Yousuf moves across and gets a direct throw at the bowler's end. Delport doesn't drag his bat there and was very causal in his approach. What a start for the Peshawar Zalmi's.
Junaid Khan to Azhar Ali, no run, leans forward and drives to mid-off
Junaid Khan to Azhar Ali, no run, length ball moving across from the middle, gets the bat pad together to block..
Junaid Khan to Azhar Ali, no run, blocks it nicely towards the off side..
Tait to Mohammad Rizwan, FOUR, pushes a full toss way down the leg, clips it nicely to wide of long leg
Tait to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, superb ball, 140 kph, comes in with the angle on a full length and swung away, beaten all around..
Tait to Mohammad Rizwan, no run, pushes full and straight outside off, leans forward and punches to mid-off

Tait to Mohammad Rizwan, OUT, and Tait strikes. Qalandars loses their third in just 10 balls. This was again a pacy stuff from Tait which comes in with the angle and batsman thought it will hold the line around the off stump. This tight line forces the batsman to come forward and was squared up touch as he pokes at it. It just swung away taking the edge of Rizwan and lands into the safe hands of the keeper.
Tait to Umar Akmal, FOUR, pushes this down leg on a length, clips it away over the backward of square leg
Tait to Umar Akmal, no run, slightly short outside the off stump blocks..
Wicket: ['Mohammad Rizwan c †Kamran Akmal b Tait 4 (4b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Junaid Khan to Azhar Ali, 1 run, length ball around the off stump, leans forward and pushes towards cover

Bravo settles down deep inside the crease, tries to reaches for it which gets only an outside edge towards the keeper as he tries to slice that over the point region. Kamran dives full length to his right and grabs a scintillating catch to remove him.
